title: AI Powered Resume Builder - BuildMyCV
techUsed: Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, LangChain, GenAI, Prisma, PostgreSQL, Docker, Firebase
description: A cutting-edge AI-powered platform that enhances resume-building efficiency and provides job analysis insights, helping users secure their dream roles.
features: AI-powered resume-building with efficiency enhancement by 70%
Advanced job fit analysis increasing accuracy by 50%
AI Chatbot Assistant for personalized resume insights
PostgreSQL for scalable and secure data handling

title: Open Source Project Discovery - OpenSox
techUsed: Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, GitHub API, Docker, Supabase, ShadCN
description: A platform for discovering and contributing to open source projects, empowering developers to find projects based on popularity, language, and skill level.
features: Discover open source projects categorized by stars, difficulty, and language
Dynamic data fetching using GitHub API for real-time project updates
Search and filtering functionality for quick access to projects
Docker multi-stage builds for streamlined deployment
Scalable architecture supporting thousands of users

title: AI Powered Blog App - Blogger App
techUsed: Next Js, TypeScript, NodeJs, GraphQL, GEMINI AI, ZOD, ShadCN UI, MongoDB
description: An AI-enhanced blogging platform that streamlines content creation and summarization, making it easy for users to craft and manage engaging blog posts.

title: Anonymous Feedback - Your Personal Anonymous Inbox
techUsed: Next Js, TypeScript, NodeJs, RestApi, OPEN AI, ZOD, ShadCN UI, MongoDB
description: A platform for users to share anonymous feedback safely, fostering open communication without revealing identity.
features: Anon Shield to protect from abuse

title: EDUHUB- A Learning Platform
techUsed: React Js, Firebase, Firebase Auth, FireStore, Firebase Storage, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion
description: An interactive learning platform for students and educators, offering real-time resources and collaborative tools to enhance education.
features: Real-time resources for educators and students
Modern and responsive UI with Tailwind CSS
